value: Chuck Norris invented Kentucky Fried Chicken's famous secret recipe with eleven herbs and spices. Nobody ever mentions the twelfth ingredient: Fear.
Chuck Norris doesn't use web standards as the web will conform to him.
Archeologists unearthed an old english dictionary dating back to the year 1236. It defined "victim" as "one who has encountered Chuck Norris"
The crossing lights in Chuck Norris's home town say "Die slowly" and "die quickly". They each have a picture of Chuck Norris punching or kicking a pedestrian.
Chuck Norris can over-write a locked variable.
Chuck Norris's OSI network model has only one layer - Physical.
Chuck Norris doesn't throw up if he drinks too much. Chuck Norris throws down!
Chuck Norris knows everything there is to know - Except for the definition of mercy.
Chuck Norris invented black. In fact, he invented the entire spectrum of visible light. Except pink. Tom Cruise invented pink.
Chuck Norris can unit test entire applications with a single assert.
Chuck Norris breaks RSA 128-bit encrypted codes in milliseconds.
What was going through the minds of all of Chuck Norris' victims before they died? His shoe.
Chuck Norris? sperm is so badass, he had sex with Nicole Kidman, and 7 months later she prematurely gave birth to a Ford Excursion.
Some people ask for a Kleenex when they sneeze, Chuck Norris asks for a body bag.
Chuck Norris was what Willis was talkin' about.
Chuck Norris doesn't need an OS.
In the movie "The Matrix", Chuck Norris is the Matrix. If you pay close attention in the green "falling code" scenes, you can make out the faint texture of his beard.
Rules of fighting: 1) Don't bring a knife to a gun fight. 2) Don't bring a gun to a Chuck Norris fight.
Chuck Norris's log statements are always at the FATAL level.
Chuck Norris drinks napalm to quell his heartburn.
